column4: hi i edited httpd.conf  to add LoadModule php5_module /usr/libapache2/modules/libphp5.so but it says some syntax error
hi i edited httpd.conf  to add LoadModule php5_module /usr/libapache2/modules/libphp5.so but it says some syntax error can ny1 help?
I have installed apache2+php5 with "sudo apt-get install apache2 php5" and nothing else, there is no need for manual configuration
